balances.poolSizeTooltip: Total ETH/PICKLE pool value on Uniswap.

connection.blockNumber: This is the current block number. This page is updated with every new block.
connection.connectPrompt: Please connect to MetaMask to use Pickle on Polygon
connection.polygonRpc: If you have been waiting more than a few seconds, consider changing to the unified Polygon RPC at 'https://polygon-rpc.com'

dill.averageLockDuration: The average lock duration is currently <1>{{ years }}</1> years (based on {{ dill }} DILL and {{ pickle }} PICKLEs locked).
dill.connectionPrompt: Please switch to Ethereum network to use DILL features.
dill.description: Stake your PICKLEs to receive a portion of the profits from PickleJars.
dill.lockTimeInvalid: selected lock time exceeds maximum lock time of {{ duration }}
dill.roundingNote: Note: your selected date will be rounded to the nearest weekly DILL epoch

farms.about: Farms allow you to earn PICKLEs by staking tokens.
farms.apy: Hover over the displayed APY to see where the returns are coming from.

arbitrum.bridgeAssets: Bridge your Ethereum assets to Arbitrum

bProtocol.info: This jar deposits into B.Protocol's Backstop AMM. All ETH liquidations are automatically sold back into users' LUSD positions and all LQTY rewards are staked in the Pickle Jar, which compounds ETH and LUSD rewards. pLQTY is automatically harvested upon withdrawing or depositing.

farms.intro:
Jars auto-invest your deposit tokens and Farms earn you $PICKLEs.
Deposit & Stake to get into both. Hover over the displayed APY to see where the returns are coming from.

mai.description: A 0.5% fee is charged by Mai Finance upon depositing
mai.rewardsEnded: Rewards have ended. Consider depositing in the new QI/MATIC Jar

abra.rewardsEnded: Note: SPELL rewards have ended for MIM/ETH

farms.mc2detail: PICKLE and SUSHI automatically harvested on staking and unstaking.
farms.migratedMasterchef: Migrated! Staking in Sushi MasterChef v2...
farms.migrateToSushi: Migrate PICKLE-ETH to Sushi for dual <1/> and <3/> rewards

polygon.description: Farms allow you to earn dual PICKLE <1/> and MATIC <3/> rewards by staking tokens. (Note: MATIC rewards end August 23)
polygon.rewards: Rewards are automatically harvested on staking and unstaking.

farms.stakeUnstaked: Stake Unstaked {{ amount }} Tokens in Farm
farms.yvBOOSTMigration:
Your tokens will be unstaked and migrated to the yvBOOST pJar and staked in the Farm.
This process will require a number of transactions.
Learn more about yvBOOST <5>here.
farms.sushiMigration:
Your PICKLE/ETH LP tokens will be unstaked and migrated from Uniswap LP tokens to Sushi LP tokens
and then staked in Sushi's MasterChef v2. This process will require a number of transactions.

gauges.chartPreview: View allocation of PICKLE reward weights <1>(based on votes cast by DILL holders)</1>
gauges.selectFarms: Select which farms to allocate PICKLE rewards to using your DILL balance

info.currentTokenBalance: Current deposit token balance in {{ target }}
info.emissionRate: Emission Rate: {{ count }} pickle per block

meta.description: Pickle Finance helps users to maximize their DeFi yields by auto-compounding their rewards, saving them time and gas.

oldFarms.disclaimer:
These Farms stopped earning $PICKLEs on Thu, Apr 22, 2021 (12 AM GMT)
To earn $PICKLEs, migrate any tokens here to the new Farms
Expand on any Farm you have tokens, and click Migrate

zap.description: Zap ETH or CRV into ETH/yvBOOST SLP and auto-deposit to <1>Pickle Farm</1>.

dashboard.pickleSubtitle: Pickle auto-compounds your rewards to boost your yield
